p: This paper focuses on the analysis of the antiproliferative activity of the chemically characterized T. vulgaris L. essential oil against breast adenocarcinoma (MCF-7) cell line, lung carcinoma (H460) cell line and acute lymphoblastic leukemia (MOLT-4) cell line. Moreover, cytotoxic concentration range screening and cytotoxicity validation in cancer cell lines and brine shrimp lethality of thyme essential oil were tested and evaluated.
